naslov: Ekskluzivno - Vila sa bazenom, prvi red uz more – Hvar, Jelsa (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Posredujemo u ekskluzivnoj prodaji prekrasne vile s bazenom i otvorenim pogledom na more u Jelsi, na otoku Hvaru. Vila se nalazi prvi red uz more na prekrasnom mjestu te ima veliku terasu za uživanje u pogledu. Vila ima 150m2, tri sobe, tri kupatila, kuhinju, dnevni boravak, bazen i vanjski kamin. Potpuno je klimatizirana i opremljena modernim namještajem,  te ima satelitsku TV i wi-fi. U blizini objekta dostupno je i besplatno parkiralište. Investicija koja vraća uloženo jer je bookirana cijelu sezonu, pa novi vlasnik može nastaviti sa uhodanim turističkim najmom, a ujedno sebi ostaviti period za vlastito korištenje. Lokacija ove nekretnine na 30 km od Makarske, 20 km od Hvara, Splitska zračna luka udaljena je 52 km i 44 km od Splita. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Exclusive - Villa with pool, first row by the sea - Hvar, Jelsa We mediate in the exclusive sale of a beautiful villa with a swimming pool and open sea view in Jelsa, on the island of Hvar. The villa is located first row by the sea in a beautiful location and has a large terrace to enjoy the view. The villa has 150m2, three bedrooms, three bathrooms, kitchen, living room, swimming pool and outdoor fireplace. It is fully air-conditioned and equipped with modern furniture, and has satellite TV and Wi-Fi. Free parking is available near the facility. An investment that returns the investment because it is booked for the whole season, so the new owner can continue with the well-established tourist rental, and at the same time leave a period for his own use. The location of this property is 30 km from Makarska, 20 km from Hvar, Split airport is 52 km and 44 km from Split. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: +385915615115 ŽELJANA
